guide.description: Concept guides for Couchbase Lite, and Sync Gateway.

introduction.paragraph: Couchbase Mobile is a full-stack mobile data solution that includes an Couchbase Lite, an embedded JSON database; Sync Gateway, a sync tier; and Couchbase Server, a robust NoSQL backend.
This section includes concept guides covering Couchbase Lite, and Sync Gateway. For more information on Couchbase Server, visit docs.couchbase.com.
